code: import{useCallback,useEffect,useRef,useContext}from"react";import TechHeightContext from"@/contexts/TechHeightContext";var useResizeTechHeight=function useResizeTechHeight(){var ref=useRef(null);var _useContext=useContext(TechHeightContext),techHeightHandler=_useContext.techHeightHandler;var resizeHandler=useCallback(function(){var current=ref.current;if(current!==null){techHeightHandler(current.clientHeight);}},[techHeightHandler,ref]);useEffect(function(){var current=ref.current;if(current!==null){techHeightHandler(current.clientHeight);}},[techHeightHandler,ref]);useEffect(function(){window.addEventListener("resize",resizeHandler);return function(){return window.removeEventListener("resize",resizeHandler);};},[resizeHandler]);return{ref:ref};};export default useResizeTechHeight;
